import { useContext, useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { checkReaction } from '../services/reaction.service' import { UserContext } from '../contexts/UserContext' import '../styles/postcard.css' export default function PostMusicCard({ card }) { const {_id, name, author, file, albumCover } = card const domain = process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_SERVICE const albumFolderRef = useRef(file.split(".")[0]) const imageRef = useRef(albumFolderRef + "/" + albumCover) function playAudio() { const audio = new Audio(`${domain}/musics/${albumFolderRef}/${file}`) audio.play() } return (
{ (image !== "") ?
:
}
